column4: Microsoft offers EU hardware  software LinkedIn concessions: sources
column5: BRUSSELS Microsoft  will still allow LinkedIn's  rivals access to its software and give hardware makers the option of installing other services to try to win EU approval for its takeover of the U.S. firm  people familiar with the matter said.

column4: Microsoft offers EU hardware  software LinkedIn concessions - sources
column5: BRUSSELS  Nov 21 Microsoft will still allow LinkedIn's rivals access to its software and give hardware makers the option of installing other services to try to win EU approval for its takeover of the U.S. firm  people familiar with the matter said.
